title.narrative: Supporting Human Capital Development in Meghalaya

description.narrative: The proposed project will help in enhancing the employability of Meghalaya's youth by improving the quality and delivery of its skill development and secondary education programs.

participating-org.narrative: Department of Ediucation, Government of Meghalaya
Department of Labor, Government of Meghalaya
Public Works Department State of Meghalaya

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improved quality, delivery, and access to SHS education and technical and vocational skills training in Meghalaya

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
(i) 5% reduction in dropout rate per annum for both girls and boys at SHS levels in 117 government-aided private schools covered under the project (baseline - 11% average drop-out at the SHS level)

description.narrative: Improved quality, delivery, and access to SHS education and technical and vocational skills training in Meghalaya

title.narrative: (ii) 60% of skilled male and female trainees for wage employment find jobs within 1 year
